---
category: news
title: "Research links mood of user posts in Odnoklassniki to weather"
excerpt: "Researchers of the HSE Graduate School of Business used machine learning to review 2.7 million user posts on the Odnoklassniki social network. They found warm weather and light breezes to be associated with the higher share of posts expressing a positive mood."
publishedDateTime: 2023-02-17T00:00:00Z
